title: Cherry crumb traybake cake
ingredients: ['For the cake', '110g butter', '200g soft brown sugar', '4 large eggs', '200g self raising flour', '1/2 teaspoon ground nutmeg', '3 tablespoons Greek yoghurt', '1/2 teaspoon vanilla extract', 'zest of 1 lemon', '225g fresh cherries, stoned and halved', 'For the crumb topping', '100g butter', '140g plain flour', '50g soft brown sugar']
